resources.string: Orchha is famous tourist place of bundelkhand.Orchha is town in Tikamgarh district which was established by Bundela chief, Rudra Pratap Singh.
At a distance of 4 km from Jhansi Junction, Jhansi Fort or Jhansi ka Kila is an ancient and historical fortress situated in the heart of Jhansi, Uttar Pradesh.
Khajuraho is a town in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh, located in Chhatarpur District.One of the most popular tourist destinations in India.
Chitrakoot is a town in the Satna district in the state of Madhya Pradesh, India. It is a town of religious, cultural, historical, situated in the Bundelkhand region.
